property.description: Property sheet to hold xml specification for forms

formalParameter.description: Configuration Name
vCloudDirector server url
Interval between attempts if Retry Request on Failure is enabled.
Sets retry attempts count when Retry Request on Failure is enabled.
The configuration name

procedure.description: Instantiate a vApp template and deploy it.

formalParameter.description: Name of the configuration which holds the connection information for vCloud Director.
Name of the organization that contains the catalog and the virtual datacenter.
Name of the catalog that contains the vApp template.
Name of the vApp template to instantiate.
Name of the virtual datacenter where the vApp will be instantiated and deployed.
Name of the new vApp.
Hostname of the new vApp.
Name for the network. If the vApp template includes an ovf:Network element, the name you specify for the vApp network must match the name specified in that element's ovf:name attribute.
Name of the network to which the vApp network connects.
How the network of the vApp is connected to the parent network.
The ElectricCommander location to store properties (default is /myJob/vCloudDirector/deployed).
The unique tag for this provision to keep it separate from other provisions stored in the same results area.
Create resources for VMs in this vApp?
Poweroff vApp after provision?
Wait time for DNS ip-association. Useful for slow DNS servers.
The ElectricCommander resource pool names to be associated with the machines in this configuration if resources are created.

step.description: Instantiate a vApp template and deploy it.

procedure.description: Make a copy of a vApp to a specified virtual datacenter.

formalParameter.description: Name of the configuration which holds the connection information for vCloud Director.
Name of the organization that contains the source virtual datacenter.
Name of the virtual datacenter that contains the vApp that will be cloned.
Name of the vApp that will be cloned.
Name for the new vApp.
Name of the virtual datacenter where the vApp will be cloned.

step.description: Make a copy of a vApp to a specified virtual datacenter.

procedure.description: Power off and optionally undeploy/delete a vApp.

formalParameter.description: Name of the configuration which holds the connection information for vCloud Director.
Name of the organization that contains the virtual datacenter.
Name of the virtual datacenter that contains the vApp to be cleaned up.
Name of the vApp that will be cleaned up.
Undeploy the vApp?.
Delete the vApp?.
The ElectricCommander location to get properties (default is /myJob/vCloudDirector/deployed).
Tag to get the deployed vApp.

step.description: Power off and optionally undeploy/delete a vApp.

procedure.description: Creates a vApp template from an instantiated vApp.

formalParameter.description: Name of the configuration which holds the connection information for vCloud Director.
Name of the organization that contains the source virtual datacenter.
Name of the catalog that will contain the vApp template.
Name of the virtual datacenter that contains the vApp that will be used.
Name of the vApp that will be used.
Name for the new vApp template.
Description for the new vApp template.

step.description: Creates a vApp template from an instantiated vApp.

formalParameter.description: Name of the configuration which holds the connection information for vCloud Director.
Name of the organization that contains the virtual datacenter.
Name of the virtual datacenter that contains the vApp to get.
Name of the vApp to get.
The ElectricCommander location to store properties (default is /myJob/vCloudDirector/deployed).
Tag to store the vApp info.

step.description: Get the XML structure of a vApp.

procedure.description: Hook for CloudManager to remove servers

formalParameter.description: A list of deployments to stop
The name of an vCloudDirector config created from the EC-vCloudDirector plugin configuration page.

procedure.description: Hook for CloudManager to add servers

formalParameter.description: Name of the configuration which holds the connection information for vCloud Director.
Name of the organization that contains the catalog and the virtual datacenter.
Name of the catalog that contains the vApp template.
Name of the vApp template to instantiate.
Name of the virtual datacenter where the vApp will be instantiated and deployed.
Name of the new vApp.
Name for the network. If the vApp template includes an ovf:Network element, the name you specify for the vApp network must match the name specified in that element's ovf:name attribute.
Name of the network to which the vApp network connects.
How the network of the vApp is connected to the parent network.
The ElectricCommander location to store properties (default is /myJob/vCloudDirector/deployed).
The unique tag for this provision to keep it separate from other provisions stored in the same results area.
Number of new servers
Pool name for creating resources

procedure.description: Hook for CloudManager to sync servers

formalParameter.description: A list of deployments to check
The name of an vCloudDirector config created from the EC-vCloudDirector plugin configuration page.
Name of the configuration which holds the connection information for vCloud Director.
Name of the organization that contains the virtual datacenter.
Name of the virtual datacenter that contains the vApp.
Name of the vApp that will be deployed/powered on.
Create resources for VMs in this vApp?.
